function RIR_EP05_14()

 "The moment she falls, I help her up. The moment she falls, I help her up. The moment she falls, I help her up." ]])

 "Hey, hey, hey! Don't stare at someone else's lover like that!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1636.wav")

    【Erika】Hospital gown・Wry smile・Sweat
 "Now, now. I guess being hospitalized makes people restless, so it can't be helped." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1637.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・Smile
 "I'm a guy, and the only skin showing is my legs, so it's okay to be looked at a bit." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1233.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Casual clothes・Anxious
 "Eh!? But those looks are obviously inappropriate... Or is it appropriate because it's between guys? No, no, no!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1234.wav")

    【Lira】Casual clothes・Sad
 "No way! Aaargh~~~~~~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1026.wav")

    【Akira】Casual clothes・Grin
 "Hehe, having a cross-dressing guy as a boyfriend must be tough, huh." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1235.wav")

    【Lira】Casual clothes・Serious
 "No way! Those guys might try to cozy up to us eventually! Let's move fast, Erika!" ]])

    PLAY_SE("SEa034.wav")

    【Lira】Casual clothes・Blushing

 "S-s-sorry..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RIR03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0459.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】Casual clothes・Smile
 "I have officially decided to express my support for Lira." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI05ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1641.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Hospital gown・Smile
 "Thank you. Having Uran on our side is truly reassuring. Please continue to support us." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    【Uran】Casual clothes・Normal
 "What are you saying? Lira, like Erika, considers the conservatives as well." ]])

    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    【Uran】Casual clothes・Yandere
